post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
Grabbed the ZBrush demo, gave it a shot, here's the results of a quick trial:

2000 polys with Normalmap

post.author: iceheart
post.body: Worthy of the daikatana mod!

post.author: Sparky
post.body:
That's one impressive hairdo!
Thanks for posting pictures of the low polygon count version. I'd very much like to try making a Doom 3 character at some point, and seeing your model is encouraging. Keep up the good work!

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body:
A new creation, 1800 unoptimized polys!









It would look better if I could get 3ds Max to load the next level hi-poly Actually, it would still look like this, just with finer detail. :/
